meanings.definition: A hard, salty Italian cheese made from sheep's milk.
meanings.sent1: I sprinkled grated pecorino on top of my pasta.
meanings.sent2: The pecorino cheese added a delicious flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent3: The mouse tried to steal the pecorino but got caught in a trap.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and salty as pecorino cheese.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of pecorino filled the kitchen, making my mouth water.

meanings.definition: A type of pasta dish made with pecorino cheese.

meanings.sent2: The creamy pecorino sauce coated every strand of pasta.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally spilled pecorino all over the kitchen floor.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the sprinkle of pecorino on top of the dish.
meanings.sent5: The warmth of the pecorino pasta reminded me of home-cooked meals.
